mapper.insert: insert into SICKBLHDR (GUID, CARDID, NAME, SEX, DEPT, AGE, GMS, BLDAT, MAINN, XBS, JWS, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, XY1, XY2, TW, XL, OTHER, ZHAND, NOTE, BJFA, DOUTYP, PRE, DOC, WDAT, ACC, ORG, SICKGUID, DOCGUID, PRENO, PRENOTE, ZDNAM, MAINNE, XBSNAM, CRTDAT, CHANGDOC, SENDKA, TELEPHONE, ISFOLLOW, PRETIM, DEPTID, CLUCOSE, GLUCOSE, LINEDATE, LINETIME, ORDERSTATUS, MEDICINEWAY, LOCGUID, SENDFLG, YBTYP, ISVIDEOPUSH, NOTEEXT,BIRTHDAY,MEDICALID) values (#{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bldat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mainn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jws,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xy1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xy2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doutyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sickguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prenote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdnam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbsnam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changdoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendka,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isfollow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pretim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clucose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glucose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locguid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sendflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ybtyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvideopush,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{medicalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select guid,doc,to_char(CREATEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as wdat,SICKGUID,DOCGUID from SICKBLHDR where SICKGUID= #{sickguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by WDAT desc

select guid,doc,to_char(wdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as wdat,SICKGUID,DOCGUID,to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as crtdat from SICKBLHDR where SICKGUID= #{sickguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DOCGUID=#{docguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by crtdat desc
select * from SICKBLHDR where SICKGUID= #{sickguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by WDAT desc

select guid,cardid,name,sex,dept,age,gms,to_char(bldat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as bldat,mainn,xbs,jws,height,weight,xy1,xy2,tw,xl,other,zhand,note,bjfa,doutyp,pre,doc,to_char(wdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as wdat ,acc,org,sickguid,docguid,preno,prenote,zdnam,mainne,xbsnam,to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as crtdat,changdoc,sendka,telephone,isfollow,pretim,deptid,clucose,glucose,linedate,linetime,orderstatus,medicineway,locguid,sendflg,ybtyp,isvideopush,noteext,medicalid,birthday from SICKBLHDR where guid=#{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}

select guid,cardid,name,sex,dept,age,gms,to_char(bldat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as bldat,mainn,xbs,jws,height,weight,xy1,xy2,tw,xl,other,zhand,note,bjfa,doutyp,pre,doc,to_char(wdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as wdat ,acc,org,sickguid,docguid,preno,prenote,zdnam,mainne,xbsnam,to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as crtdat,changdoc,sendka,telephone,isfollow,pretim,deptid,clucose,glucose,linedate,linetime,orderstatus,medicineway,locguid,sendflg,ybtyp,isvideopush,noteext,medicalid,birthday from SICKBLHDR where SICKGUID=#{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
